articles.title: Prince Philip was a 'heaven-sent consort' for the Queen, Lady Prudence Penn says - Daily Mail
articles.description: Lady Prudence Penn, 95, who is a close friend of The Queen, spoke to Tatler for their July edition which honours the Duke of Edinburgh in a special commemorative issue.
articles.content:
